Integration in Guidewire Cloud

v012612.0.1

Audio Note

This presentation is enhanced with audio.

Adjust the volume on your playback device before
continuing.

Lesson
objectives

¢ Describe the Integration Framework.

¢ List the components that make up the
Integration Framework for Guidewire Cloud.

¢ Describe how different components work
together to simplify integration in the cloud.

i Comparing integration in self-managed and cloud Gi

Self-managed

Business logic

Guidewire Cloud — Integration framework

Business logic Integration logic

Integration logic

P)

Low-code/No-code

* Integration and Business logic are
separated.

CTS bo

Several lines of Gosu
and other code bundles within
InsuranceSuite

* Eliminating Gosu code where possible
and providing no-code/low-code options
to develop integrations

i Cloud Integration Framework components G

Cloud API
Inbound HTTP calls
App Events
Publishes events ==

InsuranceSuite External systems
Integration Gateway
Integration apps
REST API Client
API callout

i Why use the Integration Framework? a

Improved speed in putting integrations in place
allows more time for solving business problems

By using proven frameworks and industry best
practices, integrations are more resilient and fault
tolerant

Removing integration code from core apps reduces
size of application builds; standardized integrations
reduce risk inherent in custom code

& &

/common/v1 /account/v1
/productdefinition/v1 [job/v1
/apis /apis

maintenance
APIs.

« More coming in
future releases.

Access Cloud API Swagger documentation at <application URL>/resources/swagger-ui/
